issue.title: [CF 1375] Error
issue.body:
Hei, i cant load the addon i just get this error massege 

Date: 2017-02-12 04:05:49
ID: 4
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 47:
Cannot find a library instance of "LibOO-1.0".
Debug:
[C]: error()
!Swatter\Support\LibStub.lua:23: LibStub()
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:47: in main chunk
Locals:
(*temporary) = "Cannot find a library instance of "LibOO-1.0"."

 

i have tried to reinstall it but it doesn't work


> Posted by CurseForge user hkon1996 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1375 | Raw

comments.body:
Don't use nolib versions of the addon if you don't plan on installing and/or ensuring that the libraries are enabled.

 

Also, don't tag your issues with Can't Fix. You aren't the one who decides if something can or can't be fixed.

Edited Feb 11, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
